description: Central numbers in the (2,3)-Pascal triangle A029600.
comments: For n > 0 also central terms of (1,4)-Pascal triangle A095666. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 08 2012]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: From Peter Bala, Aug 16 2011: (Start)a(n) = 5/2*binomial(2*n,n) for n >= 1.O.g.f.: -3/2+5/2*1/sqrt(1-4*x) = 1+5*x+15*x^2+50*x^3+... = 1+5*x*d/dx(log(C(x))), where C(x) is the o.g.f. for the Catalan numbers A000108. (End)
author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_
